title: My Blog
text:
Welcome to my blog where I share updates and insights on AI, healthcare, and more.
Visit my Quarto Blog

title: Publications
text:
Selected Publications

Leveraging AI to Optimize Vaccines Supply Chain and Logistics in Africa: Opportunities and Challenges. Frontiers in Pharmacology.
Enhancing primary healthcare delivery in Nigeria through the adoption of advanced technologies. narra X.
Analyzing COVID-19 Vaccination Sentiments in Nigerian Cyberspace. arXiv preprint arXiv:2401.13133.
Beyond English: Offensive Language Detection in Low-Resource Nigerian Languages. 5th Workshop on African Natural Language Processing.
HausaNLP at SemEval-2024 Task 1: Textual Relatedness Analysis for Semantic Representation of Sentences. 18th International Workshop on Semantic Evaluation.
Leveraging Closed-Access Multilingual Embedding for Automatic Sentence Alignment in Low Resource Languages. arXiv preprint arXiv:2311.12179.

title: About Me
text:
I am a dedicated professional with a solid foundation in Pharmacy, specializing in leveraging Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning for Biomedical Informatics. Currently, I am employed at Zipline, where I contribute to the delivery of medical supplies using innovative drone technology. My focus is on harnessing technology to improve healthcare accessibility and effectiveness, particularly in areas that have limited access to traditional medical services.
My interests span across several domains, including data-driven healthcare solutions, computational drug discovery, epidemiology, and biostatistics. Each of these interests fuels my dedication to making healthcare smarter and more efficient. Whether it’s optimizing the logistics of healthcare delivery, developing predictive models for disease outbreaks, or finding novel ways to apply AI in drug discovery, I am passionate about finding impactful and sustainable solutions.
Beyond my professional work, I am also an active mentor and advocate for the next generation of data scientists and healthcare professionals, sharing my knowledge to inspire others to explore the exciting possibilities that data and technology bring to healthcare.

title: About Me
text:
Research Interests

Biomedical Informatics
Machine Learning in Health Applications
Computational Drug Discovery
Biostatistics in Clinical Trials
Data-Driven Healthcare Solutions
Health Data Analytics
Medical Imaging and Informatics

title: About Me
text:
Volunteer Work
I am actively engaged in volunteer work to support and mentor aspiring data scientists and healthcare professionals:

DeepLearning.AI Forum Mentor and Moderator: I contribute by organizing content, mentoring learners (Tensorflow Developer Professional Certification), and participating in discussions to help the community grow.
Arewa Data Science Fellowship Mentor: I provide mentorship in Python programming and data science libraries with a focus on healthcare applications.
Medical Community Development Group: I participated in medical outreach programs and health education initiatives in underserved communities during my service year. I still contribute to such initiatives in my free time.

title: Lukman Jibril Aliyu
text:
My name is Lukman Jibril Aliyu, and I am a pharmacist dedicated to advancing Biomedical Informatics and Artificial Intelligence (AI) to improve healthcare outcomes. My work lies at the intersection of healthcare, technology, and data, aiming to develop innovative solutions that address critical challenges in healthcare delivery, particularly in underserved areas.
This website showcases my projects, publications, and the journey that has taken me from pharmacy practice to the forefront of Biomedical Informatics, Natural Language Processing (NLP), and AI. My research spans Global Health, Epidemiology, and Biostatistics, with a strong focus on data-driven innovations. Notably, my work in NLP includes developing language technologies for underrepresented languages like Hausa and leveraging AI to improve clinical text processing and understanding.
From improving medical supply chains and logistics, to modeling disease dynamics, to applying biostatistical methods for personalized interventions, my focus remains on creating impactful, scalable solutions for real-world health challenges.
I invite you to explore my projects, publications, and NLP research contributions to learn more about my passion for harnessing technology to build a healthier world.
Learn more about me




March 2025: Recognized as best tester for the first course of the DeepLearning.AI Data Analytics Professional Certificate. I was also selected as a course mentor.
February 2025: Our paper titled Leveraging AI to Optimize Vaccines Supply Chain and Logistics in Africa: Opportunities and Challenges was published.
December 2024: Our paper titled Enhancing primary healthcare delivery in Nigeria through the adoption of advanced technologies was published.
November 2024: Featured across all DeepLearning.AI social media platforms for my remarkable journey integrating AI into my professional practice, as documented in my blog article
September 2024: Won 3rd place in the Data Science for Health Ideathon at the Deep Learning Indaba, 2024.
August 2024: Earned the “Devotee” badge on the DeepLearning.AI Forum for participating consistently for 365 consecutive days.
August 2024: Selected as a Mentor by DeepLearning.AI and Coursera for the Tensorflow Developer Professional Certificate as a result of my insightful contributions as a course tester.
November 2023: Presented our research paper: Analyzing COVID-19 Vaccination Sentiments in Nigerian Cyberspace: Insights from a Manually Annotated Twitter Dataset, at the International Conference on Computing and Advances in Information Technology (ICCAIT).
May 2023: Came second place in the Cohere AI Hack for developing a language alignment tool.

title: Selected Projects
text:
Developed an efficient sentence alignment tool pairing Hausa with English translations using multilingual embeddings.
Achieved an F1 score of 95%, securing second place in the Cohere AI Hack 2023.
